data.detailed_description: With this DLC, you can discover how this story-game was made with the script-code of the storyline, in PDF format! While the code does use English terms, the story (text) is in its original version, aka French.
data.about_the_game: With this DLC, you can discover how this story-game was made with the script-code of the storyline, in PDF format! While the code does use English terms, the story (text) is in its original version, aka French.
data.short_description: With this DLC, you can discover how this story-game was made with the script-code of the storyline, in PDF format!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 +
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
